page.title: 17PLACES TO PLAY IN STEVENAGE
page.content: In my spare time I play at the Play Scheme.It is a sort of mobile with four rooms,the kitchen, the main room with games, the video room and the toilets.We also play at the playing fields near my house. There is a climbing frame, in the middle is also logs and five trees.I use the trees for goal post. There is a play area in Bude Crescent.Which has a slide, a jump for bikes and a climbing frame.We play tennis in the middle of the road and Gary's neighbour moans because it hits their car when we play football near my next door neighbour's house he moans because it keeps on going in his garden.{ {
